review_text: Such a cozy place to crash after a long work day! Had everything we need. Would come back ☺️

Great location for our purpose. Even though we did not travel with children, the home is very accommodating to children and dogs. We had everything we needed for preparing meals, with a grocery store within walking distance. The photos of the home were helpful in preparing for our trip such as coffee necessities, parking, and pet needs. The home is well supplied with information of the area attractions. Great job Kelli, we will be calling on you again!
Comfortable place with backyard for the dogs. Access to backyard is outside and is separate access from house. Beautiful town with lots of surrounding hikes.

Stayasaurus was ideal place to come home to. My family has a ranch in the area, and after a day of work it was delightful to come back to such a welcoming place. I will be staying there again. Thank you Kelli.

When I found this place, I knew it was the one. I mean, the DINOSAURS!!! If you have a love for dinosaurs like my son & I do, this is the place to stay while you explore the dinosaur capital of the US! This was such a fun place to stay and perfectly comfortable. Wonderful shower with great hot water and cozy beds at the end of the day. We did not have a single issue our entire week. Would definitely, most certainly, stay here again! And Vernal is one of the best secrets I've ever found!

The Stay-a-saurus is the place to stay in Vernal. Kelli has the place set up with everything you need for a comfortable stay. The decor is fun and fitting for the area. The location was perfect. Located in a quiet neighborhood not too far from the main streets of Vernal. Quick access to restruants, grocery stores, and attractions. Highly recommend this place for a short or long stay.
Kelli was a great host with an awesome pet friendly place to stay for the week! Thank you for responding so quickly when weather was creating an issue on our long journey home.
This was a great stay with our 6 year old, quick access to Dinosaur National Monument. The place was relatively clean and amazingly stocked!

Kelli's place was just right for our stay in Vernal. The dinosaur theme throughout the house is whimsical and fun, and we were very comfortable. It's a short drive from the museum, dinosaur monument, and Moonshine Arch, which were the places we wanted to visit this time around. Kelli was also very responsive and friendly. I recommend this place, and would definitely stay again.
A comfortable, clean and convenient home in a quiet neighborhood. We’d definitely stay here again!

Had a great time this weekend! A lovely, cozy home perfect for us and our pup. We would have stayed here longer if we had time! Great location and was able to visit the local businesses recommended! Kelli provided coupons, guides, and literally everything needed for a stay.
Perfect house. Clean and loaded with everything required for us to feel at home for a week. Will stay here again next year if available!
Loved our stay! The house was fully stocked and cozy. My kiddo loved all the dinosaur decor and the toys were a nice add as well. Great stay and host experience!

The house was exactly what we were looking for. Great neighborhood and very safe. The views around the entire area were beautiful. I would of loved to stay there longer. Kelli was a great host and her father was great also.
Thank you Kelli
Adorable guest home. We were very comfortable. Happy to find this little gem that was also very accommodating to our two dogs. Thank you for your hospitality.

This was our second stay in Kelli’s home! The home is beautifully decorated and very cozy. It has all the amenities we need and lots of great recommendations for local activities. I highly recommend this home for a very comfortable stay in Vernal. We will definitely be back again! Thank you, Kelli!

What a great location! The Airbnb was well-stocked, had many personal and thoughtful touches, and really worked as a great home base after our fun-filled days out-and-about. Kelli is a great and responsive host, too, and made us feel right at home.
Very cozy space, we had a great stay! Super thoughtful and well equipped, very comfortable. Grateful to be well rested for our hiking adventures.

Quiet neighborhood, not far from the main road that runs through town, very clean and more than worth the price for the space and privacy. The kitchen is well stocked and we loved all the dino decor as well! We didn't have a dog with us, but there are lots of accommodations if you do (pet blankets, water bowls, leashes, etc.) Kelli takes good care of the space and we're glad we got the chance to stay. ❤️

The stayasaurus house was very cute, clean, and comfortable! Seriously one of the nicest Airbnb properties I’ve stayed in. The neighborhood was quiet and peaceful. Vernal was a great town and served as a great home base for outdoor adventures in the Uinta Basin.
The house was perfect for us as we explored the area. So many thoughtful homey touches that made us so comfortable. We each said multiple times - I could live here just as it is. Very well done!

We stayed at Kelli’s place for three nights and we felt right at home. From the dino toys for our son to the kitchen amenities and laundry access, it checked all of our boxes and really helped to make our stay a comfortable and memorable one. Thank you!

We really enjoyed our stay here. The access to the home was incredibly convenient. Kelli’s detailed instructions and clear communication meant we had a smooth, hassle-free check-in. Kelli, as a host, was exceptional. She was helpful and quick to respond to our questions on the Airbnb app.
A standout feature for us was the well-stocked kitchen. It had everything we could possibly need, from cooking utensils to a fantastic selection of Keurig coffee.
Dog owners will be happy to know that Kelli’s place is not just pet-friendly, it's pet-cherishing! Our dog was treated as an esteemed guest with dedicated dog blankets, and food and water dishes readily available. Our furry family member felt right at home.
The home has a cute dinosaur theme that thrilled our kids. Every corner of the house is tastefully adorned with dino-inspired touches, which we really enjoyed. Thanks again to Kelli.
Great place! It has a very warm feel and it’s near great food and great trails!
So much better than staying at a hotel! Beds were comfy and kitchen was well stocked. Was so nice to have a stocked wash room, too. No need to wash clothes when we get home.
We loved our stay here! We felt right at home and there were lots of great amenities. My kids loved the dinosaur theme and toys! The place was easy to find and clean and cozy!
Very convenient location, quiet, and comfortable. Greatly appreciate that it was very dog friendly.
Neat little home. Cozy, and near hwy 40 food, etc.

We loved our stay! Great for families travelling with kids, especially dinosaur fans. The house was extremely well stocked with all the essentials you'd expect plus more (example: no need to make a Walmart run to pick up dishwashing tablets or laundry detergent or Ziploc bags). If we're ever back in Vernal, we'll be staying here for sure.
Excellent experience!

We absolutely LOVED the Stay-a-saurus! We loved it so much, in fact, that we booked an extra night to our stay! This home is adorable and tastefully decorated with a dinosaur theme throughout. Kelli even had tiny pink souvenir dinosaurs for take-home gifts. My daughter had dinosaur sheets on her bed that were so cute. The living room was warm & cozy, and we enjoyed looking out the floor-to-ceiling windows. Great sofa and rocker! The kitchen was fantastic and well-appointed. Kelli made our little dogs feel right at home by providing doggy bed & blankets, bowls, and dog bones. They loved playing in the fenced yard and walking around the block. There was a nice visitor's information book about the area attractions and places to eat. We loved this place so much that we didn't want to leave. It was the best place that we stayed on our two week trip. We hope to come back someday!
Beautiful house, and location. It’s a great little house. The bed was the perfect amount of soft and firm. The yard was perfect for the doggies. 10/10

We loved Kelli's place and would definitely stay again! It's close to everything, cozy and comfortable. There is not one thing Kelli hasn't thought of amenity-wise in her home. Fun games, blankets, everything you need for cooking, recommendations for in town, etc.
Her place is also super dog friendly which is a nice change from people who allow dogs but kind of make you feel unwelcome or send you a giant list of rules. She had dog bowls, a bed, leashes, blankets, etc, and a nice fenced yard for them.

Stay-a-saurus was a perfect landing place for our family trip to Dinosaur National Monument (in fact, I think our six year old might have been more excited about all the Dino toys there than the actual monument). This place has everything you need—very comfortable, clean and with many thoughtful touches. Wholeheartedly recommend!

On our long trip across the US staying at many different places, Kelli’s house is by far the best place we have stayed out. It was very clean, innovative decorations, and well provisioned.. Wish all our stays were this good.
Nice little place, clean, tasteful furniture, Dino-themed. Small for more than two adults.
Wonderful and our grandchildren were able to visit daily and loved the Dino’s!!
We have stayed here several times. The location is great, close to everything. The home is cleaned and stocked with everything you would need. Look forward to stay there again next year.
The house was as described. It was clean and cozy. It is so nice to be able to travel with our dogs and have a yard for them!
This place is great! Lots of information about the area available in the house. Clean and comfortable.
What a perfect place to stay. Highly recommend it for anyone spending time in the Dinosaur National Monument area.
Great little place! Thanks!
Everything was clean, location was great, and tons of amenities were provided!

Kelli’s house offered the perfect stay in Vernal! It is super cozy, beautifully decorated with lots of thoughtful touches. We had everything we needed for a comfortable few day away from home. Kelli was very accommodating, we couldn’t have been happier with our stay!

Our stay at Kelli's home was perfect. It was well stocked, comfortable, conveniently located, and full of thoughtful details. Her generosity, thoughtfulness, and beautifully decorated home made our trip that much more fun!

This place was clean, comfortable, convenient for our trip. It was a short drive to Dinosaur National Monument and close to a great grocery store and Thai restaurant. Our dogs were happy and comfortable. They loved the yard and having back-up supplies was helpful. Check-in was a breeze and the owner was communicative.
This was our second stay here and we will be back.
A nice place to call home while discovering the area. Close to main street which has everything you need.

The Stay-A-Saurus sure lived up to its name! Every nook and cranny is thoughtfully appointed with dinosaur themed touches in every room. The home was well stocked with freshly laundered towels, wash clothes, and even robes. The beds were comfortable, with plenty of pillows if you need them. The water pressure in the shower was ample with plenty of hot water if you enjoy long showers. The bathtub is deep if you prefer to bathe.
The kitchen was well stocked (perhaps that’s an understatement) with everything you could possibly need to prepare your meals. Every drawer and cupboard was neatly organized making finding what you need a cinch.
The washer/dryer ran quietly, but boy they got the job done. I love coming home from a week-long vacation without any dirty laundry to wash. It’s the little things, I’m tellin’ ya.
The home is on a well-lit street in a safe, quiet area near parks, and baseball fields. Our kids were able to make a few friends in the neighborhood during our stay.
An ice cream truck even stopped by! The backyard is completely fenced, perfect if you’re traveling with your pups.
Checking in/out was a breeze. The check-out to-do list is short, and sweet.
It did not feel like we were staying in someone else’s house. We all felt right at home. ❤️
We will definitely book with Kelli again any time we’re in town to visit our families.
-The Davis family

Comfortable, clean, convenient and full of dinosaurs, if we are ever in the area, we will be back!
The host was responsive and helpful and the location was close to the things we wanted to do!

Everything about this bungalow is simply awesome. Our experience from booking to checking out was just first rate. The home is very cute, nicely decorated and just very homey. I could live here…lol!! It’s in a safe and friendly neighborhood that is close to everything in town. We were in town for an unfortunate reason. My husband was in a motorcycle accident and had to stay in the hospital. Kelli was very quick to respond to me trying to book a place while stressing out over the situation. I really appreciate her fast response and great communication. Check in and out were super easy. We highly recommend this cute home if you are staying in the area for any reason. Definitely in our top tier for Airbnb stays and experiences. Thank you!!
Cute, clean, and quiet place. And good location for seeing the sights in Dinosaur.

This is your perfect stay if you’re going to dinosaur national Monument! I highly recommend you also visit the natural history Museum in Vernal as well as flaming gorge. Kelli also provided pamphlets of lots of other things to do in the area. There are a few local restaurants where you can eat and plenty of fast food options. There’s a Walmart within driving distance. We came up for my sons eighth birthday and he absolutely loved it. Great family stay!

Great place to stay! House is very nice and location is close to Dinosaur National Monument Park and Vernal Brewery. The surrounding area is beautiful to see. Don’t forget to go to Flaming Gorge. If your into birding it’s a must to go to Ouray Wildlife Management Area.

Kelli’s place was great for our stay while we were in the area to visit Dinosaur National Monument. It was extremely family friendly for traveling with our kids, ages 3 and 5. The house was really clean and had everything we needed and more! Definitely recommend!
Absolutely adorable. Great location. Comfortable home where we felt very welcome.
Great location for a great price! Quite and close to lots of things. Has a lot of the basics that you might need like kitchen essentials and toiletries. Would for sure stay here again!
Quiet neighborhood, super clean and cozy place. Well stocked kitchen. Great place for checking out Vernal.
Very cute place, very clean! Enjoyed our stay!
Great place very comfortable and close to everything
House has everything a family with kids and pets could want!
Stayasaurus is pet friendly and close to town. This place was comfortable and felt like our home away from home.
Super place with lots of “extras”. Great communication with owners and super dog friendly. We had a great time and would love to return.
Everything was as described. Very clean and comfortable.

What a fantastic property!! Good location in a very quiet neighborhood. Extremely clean and cozy bungalow with all the right touches (including some of Kelli's artwork). We stayed for 2 nights while visiting Dinosaur National Monument and the local museums. This place has everything you need- and then some .. for a very comfortable stay. We also loved all of the facets falling under the dinosaur theme. Thank you again Kelli. We will be sure to book here again when we are in the Vernal area!
Wonderfully located and full of thoughtful touches and everything we could need to be cozy, we loved staying at Kelli’s!

The Stay-a-Sauras house checks all the boxes! Central location, oh so comfortable, very well stocked with all you may need, amusing Dino theme, welcoming for my dog, and a very responsive friendly hostess! We will be back.
this place was great nice little place to get away

This bungalow was in a nice, quiet neighborhood on a corner lot, it felt cozy and very comfortable here. I loved the dinosaurs theme and decor and games. I tried to have Betty Ann’s cinnamon roll per the guestbook recommendation, but they were permanently closed?? I would love to come back!
Nancy
South Ogden, UT
Great place. Close to town and had everything we needed.

Another great stay! I can't say enough good words about this bungalow - super clean, great location, quiet safe neighborhood, nice host, great communications, really nice decor, top notch everything. Oh, and did I mention the awesome art? Kelli's an artists, and her artistic taste is abundant throughout. Will definitely stay again.
My family had such a wonderful time in Vernal. The property was clean, the beds were so comfortable and it had everything we needed. We would definitely stay there again.
Clean, quiet, private. Kitchen was well-stocked. Everything you would expect in a small AirBnB. The ‘dino’ decor was perfect. Would definitely recommend.
Stayasaurus was a clean place to stay. The house had everything we needed to prepare meals!!
Great place to stay to visit local attractions. Very clean, well stocked, and comfortable.
was very nice very clean and great location

We booked a hotel for our 2-night stay in Vernal but at the last minute decided to cancel that and find something with a little more space. Kelli’s place was exactly what we needed—clean, convenient, and just enough space for our family of 4. Our toddler loved playing with the toy dinosaurs and puzzles!
Our stay was great. Nice central location and had everything we needed. Comfy beds!

We had a wonderful time! We had everything we needed, and it was wonderful to have a place to rest, relax, and prep meals. Kelli is a thoughtful host, going above and beyond to give you a wonderful experience. Stay here - it'll be a lovely time!

This was one of the best resort rentals I’ve ever stayed in. Very comfortable and the dinosaur touches were well done and very tasteful. They made the house very unique. It’s in a very quiet neighborhood and everything about the house has class. The sheets and towels are high-quality. Vernal has everything you need if you’re on a road trip and want to re-supply.

Great place to stay for a girls adventure trip in a nice, quiet neighborhood. Good location, easy to find, close to the grocery store, cafes and the main street. Plenty of supplies already in the house for cooking. We visited Dino National Monument went rafting and to Flaming Gorge.

Great place! Really close to the town of Vernal and easily accessible to Dinosaur National Monument. We saw both the Utah and Colorado sides of the monument and we loved it. The home’s dinosaur touches everywhere were great. We were very comfortable and would recommend the place to others.

Stayasaurus place was so lovely, and the little toys and puzzles were so appreciated. My boys loved having those to play with after being in the car all day. The Dino decor is so tastefully done, and really enjoyed the acrylic pour paintings on the wall. Everything was just as described, it was so cozy, and having the washer and dryer was a huge bonus. As the host suggests, eat at Betty’s and get a cinnamon roll!!
The home was lovely and convenient, we were comfortable and able to rest up from our travels.

Great place! Cute and convenient! Host has thought of everything you may need and provided it for you.
There is an air conditioner— window unit in one room. There is a swamp cooler in another, plus fans. We happened to go when it was very hot, and the window unit was not enough to cool off the whole place.
We had a great time at Kelli’s place!

Very conveniently located to so many fun things. The house worked great for my husband and two kids. We were there over the fourth and watched the town fireworks from the yard. They were only a couple blocks away, so it felt like we had a front row seat.

The property is a great value and very conveniently located quite close to all the services you will need in Vernal, UT while still being in a quiet residential neighborhood. It serves as a great base to explore the surrounding area, especially DInosaur National Monument as it is less than 30 min away from the Quarry Visitor Center.
The house was quite clean, had all the amenities for a comfortable stay and it was clear that thought has gone into everything throughout the property. It is also dog friendly which was much appreciated.

Stay-a-saurus was a wonderful place! The quality of the appliances and furnishings made us feel as if we were staying in a home, rather than a rental unit. The little touches, like welcome chocolates! and area restaurant and activity information was much appreciated. The little dinosaur decor throughout the house was entertaining. The bed was comfortable, the bedroom window curtains dark for sleeping, and the kitchen fully stocked with everything we needed. The neighborhood was a pleasant residential area with off-street parking for our car. Thanks so much Kelli!
Great place to explore the Vernal area and Dinosaur National Monument. A very quiet residential neighborhood. The Stayosaurus is recommended
Nice accommodations.
This was our 2nd time at the Stayasaurus and it was just as expected! We love this place, has everything you need and our dogs love the fenced backyard and the short walk to the park!
Stay-a-saurus is perfect spot for your dinosaur - or Vernal - adventures. Loved the spot, as did our 3 yr old. Perfect, centrally located spot too!
This is the type of stay we expect when using AirBNB.

We loved this great little bungalow! It was perfect for us and appreciate we could bring our doggie. Really everything was great. Most important for us was the feeling we had there. We felt so comfortable! Kelli was great to get back to us quickly whenever we had a question which was much appreciated. Thanks Kelli!
Templ & Mike & Teddy
Kelli’s home is very nice, updated and furnished thoughtfully. We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Vernal. Thanks so much.
Super clean, very charming, and a great spot for exploring Dinosaur National Monument.
Awesome home! I loved everything about the stay, it is clean, quiet, and great location. Kelli is so great to respond to any needs. I would definitely book with Kelli again!
Great place to stay! Larger than expected

You can't go wrong staying here. Kelli thought of everything from water bowls for the dog to toys for adventure seeking kids. The bed was very comfortable and the location was great with proximity to parks. We'd definitely stay again. Thank you!

Kelli is a great host! We felt welcome the moment that we stepped in the door! She absolutely thinks of everything! What made this stay even better is that we were able to have our two mini Aussies with us, they enjoyed the fenced backyard and we found a wonderful walking park just down the street, which was great for all of us! The neighborhood is nice and quite and convenient to parks, shopping and dining. We had some fabulous food from 4 of Vernal’s restaurants, which are open during COVID and we highly recommend all four! Betty’s for breakfast, make sure you come hungry.. the ham steak and fried potatoes are fantastic! Antica Forma has a great wood fired pizza and salad! We ate at Plaza Mexicana for lunch, we loved the enchiladas, the mole sauce is amazing! Our favorite place was The Quarry Steakhouse & Brewery.. the best Ribeye ever! We were in Vernal for an ice fishing tournament with Ice Addiction, we loved our stay so much that we have already booked the Stay-A-Saurus again this summer so that we can explore more in Vernal and fish and ATV. Thank you Kelli, we can’t wait to come back!

We had such a lovely time exploring in the area, and we're so thankful to be able to bring our best pals to a dog-friendly place. This house is just perfect, so clean, had a great backyard was in perfect proximity to our adventures. Highly recommend. :)
Lovely!

AMAZING place. Every possible need has been thought of, this house is incredibly clean, well-thought out and well-stocked. Extremely easy and central home base for visiting Dino Nat'l Park and several petrogylph locations, Vernal as a town is very easy to navigate and also has everything you'd need for a short or long stay. Kelli was a terrific host and handled even tiny issues immediately, we really couldn't have asked for a better experience. The best recommendation we can give: we have already made plans to stay here again. Thank you Kelli!
Really nice place to stay. The dinosaur theme was a cute touch.
Awesome value and a darling place to stay! Close to town and full of awesome amenities. Especially cute and tailored for pet owners. Loved it!

Super cute place completely stocked for any type of stay. We were able to prepare several thanksgiving dishes here with no trouble at all. Comfortable beds, awesome bath/shower, plenty of parking, and dozens of fun little touches. We will be back!
Great spot to go check out some dinosaurs.
What a great find! Super close to anything you would need in vernal. Hopefully we will back soon!
The Stay-a-saurus is a cute little house with good accommodations. It was perfect for our visit. We would stay there again.
The place was cute and a nice place for a little getaway!
I liked so many things about this airbnb- from the quiet location, to the pet friendly space, to the comfy bed. Just an all around solid place to stay!

We had such a wonderful stay at your place in Vernal! Thank you so much for having us - we really appreciated the thoughtful little touches like the chocolates on the kitchen table, and we were so happy and surprised at how well stocked the kitchen was :) we ended up cooking quite a bit, which was perfect for one of the particularly cold days we were there. The dinosaur decor is amazing, all the furniture and beds are super comfy, and the kitchen is a space you’ll want to spend every morning in. We loved staying with you. Thank you for your hospitality!
Awesome place in a beautiful town! The dinosaur theme works great!
Excellent location for travel in area. Clean and modern place - love the dinosaur decorations - great bedroom, living room, and kitchen area space. Easy check-in with lockbox.

Kelli’s Vernal Bungalow was an awesome place to stop for the night on a long road trip.
My girlfriend is a huge dinosaur nerd and she was taken by all the little dino-details in the BnB. Very delightful touches!
Kelli has some coupons for a local Mexican spot too. Beware how much you order, because the portions are huge!

Fantastic place! The dinosaur decor was very charming. Great for a small family—nice bathtub and other kid-friendly touches. Immaculate, fully stocked kitchen, comfortable beds and furniture. Excellent value!
Kelli's place was awesome and so close to Dinosaur National Monument.
My pup, husband and I had a wonderful stay at this adorable spot :)

Wow! What a great stay. The Stay-a-saurus was a perfect spot for a little get away. My kids loved being close to the park and baseball fields. I loved the style and comfort Kelli’s place provided. This Airbnb feels like a cute little boutique hotel with all the amenities of home. The guidebook pointed us to some great fun and my dog enjoyed being a special guest as well. I will definitely be booking again the next time I’m in Vernal.

It was very pretty and looked just like the pictures! She was very kind and answered all the questions I had. We didn’t have to text her the whole time during our stay because the instructions were very clear and easy to follow.

The Suite Olive was the perfect stop after a long day of driving. Located in a quiet beautiful area with plenty to do. The suite itself was stunning, clean, spacious and very comfortable, and for a great price! Strongly recommend!

When a listing has been designed with the end use in mind, it truly shines. Everything was perfect, everything you could think you would need was supplied. Just a great design and really well implemented. Would absolutely recommend.
Beautifully decorated! Felt very much at home. I loved the fire place. It was just what I needed for an over night stay! Thank you for hosting me Jade.
This place was amazing! It was so clean and had every amenity we needed and wanted. The kitchen was well equipped and the space is beautiful! Highly recommend!
Jade has created a beautiful and peaceful place for travelers to relax.

This is a great place, in a quiet neighborhood. The place is super nice and very clean. It had everything I needed for my visited. Very close to “downtown”. The awesome local pizza place was only 4 minutes away. About a 20 minute drive to some really cool outdoor adventures.

This place was a welcome retreat after a day spent hiking throughout Dinosaur Nat'l Monument. The kitchen had everything we needed to prepare our dinner, the beds were comfy, and the shower was awesome - large, great shampoos, and plenty of hot water. Knowing that this was the basement of the owner's home, we expected to hear some overhead noise, and that was very minimal and definitely not distracting. Getting to Dinosaur is really easy from this location and we'd definitely stay here again!

As a new user, i was worried, for no reason.
The location was amazing. Great house and amazing sights nearby. 100% recommend.
Clean well kept
The place was perfect as always. Jade and Mallory are great hosts. My husband couldn’t have asked for a better stay!
great place and easy check in! would definitely stay here again
Jade’s basement unit was very clean and comfortable. The space was light and cozy.

what a gorgeous space! beautifully put together. the bathroom is huge and I love the tile, and the fireplace was so nice to have! hosts are great with communication and super friendly and helpful. I'd love to stay again

Jade’s place was perfect for what we needed! They were extremely friendly and hospitable and had a whole binder of local info and recommendations. It was spotless and cute and there were also toys, high chair, etc for our little ones and it made us feel comfortable and right at home!

The place was super nice and equipped with everything needed for a long-term stay. The hosts were responsive and made sure we had everything needed throughout the stay. We highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone looking for a great place to stay!

I was at first wary about booking a place with only two reviews, but am so glad I did! The unit looks brand new, with a beautiful kitchen and bathroom. You can tell it was recently built/renovated. I felt very comfortable, and would not hesitate to return. While I stayed only one night, the unit would be perfect for a long-term stay, as it has everything one would need (including laundry) to feel at home.

New, clean, modern, and well put together! ......Like a nice hotel suite but about half the price! We especially liked the built-in electric fireplace, kitchen styling/functionality, and large shower with amazing tile craftsmanship.

Jade has made a very cute place to stay. We were surprised and grateful with the healthy snacks she left out and with the Keurig! Everything was so clean and welcoming. Our stay was very pleasant and we will definitely stay again. Thanks Jade!

Lisa and Erik’s tiny home was a perfect place for our family to spend the night on a roadtrip. The views of Dinosaur National Monument from the property, even right outside our front door, could not be more spectacular. The location is very quiet and private with amazing stargazing. Lisa’s detailed instructions for how to find the place were very helpful, especially since we arrived in the dark. The fact that their private airport sits on the same property is super cool too. The king bed was very comfortable and there was just enough room for our 2 kids to sleep as well using the sofa bed. The home is small and cozy, with just the amenities we needed for a comfortable night and morning. The bathhouse is a separate building right next door, but was also exclusively for our use, and everything is brand new and private. We will definitely stay again when in the area!
Absolutely beautiful place! Loved the location. The surroundings were pretty and peaceful. Definitely would stay here again!
We really enjoyed our stay. It was a perfect base for exploring Dinosaur National Monument. It was very quiet and peaceful, and we enjoyed the rural setting. Sherrie was a great host.
So clean and wonderful! Perfect in every way
We used Sherry's place in transit for 1 night. The breakfast on the veranda overlooking the meadows and the reservoir was simply beautiful.

We cannot say enough good about this place. It is beautiful inside and out. Well-designed with very comfortable furniture—some of which is handmade. Quiet with a gorgeous view and private area out back, all of which draws on the natural beauty around the place.

My adult family and I stayed 3 nights while exploring Dinosaur National Monument and Flaming Gorge. This location is out of Town offering a beautiful and peaceful spot. We picked up some groceries before arrival and were able to enjoy the evenings after days of driving. The theater room was a real bonus. Comfortable beds, peace and quiet. It was my second stay and I would not hesitate to return again.

This place is squeaky clean! It felt very private, even though it is connected to their home. The design provides privacy and comfort. This home has high end furnishings, beds, etc. It felt like a retreat. I was there for work, but will definitely bring my family back for fun. They will enjoy the theater room. Sherrie provided excellent directions and prompt communication.

Stunning location with an incredible view. Just as described. The theater room was better than we could have imagined. Beds were comfortable. Lots of space to spread out. We loved the popcorn machine with the supplies. A short drive to all the attractions in town. The host was responsive and offered great check in and check out directions. Loved the recommendations book! Would stay again for sure.

Loved staying a short drive from the main town. Sitting outside and watching the sunset in the quiet was a great way to wind down after a day of hiking. We indulged in popcorn that was graciously provided in the media room a few nights.
Nothing but great things to say. Awesome location, quiet, clean, the theatre room was a pleasant surpise as was the huge lovesac chair.
